Setting laser parameters¶

Comments …

Profile¶

class pelpi.Profile(time_profile, space_profile, **kwargs)[source]¶

class for defining pulse profile envelope

time_profile, string

Temporal profile of the pulse Available profiles :

“gaussian”, You must define the time_fwhm variable for setting the time full width half maximum
space_profile, string

Spatial profile of the pulse (waist). Available profiles :

“gaussian”, You must define the space_fwhm variable for setting the spatial full width half maximum (waist)

“top-hat”, You must define the space_radius variable for setting the spatial radius (waist)

include …

Laser¶

class pelpi.Laser(name, wavelength, energy, Profile, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class for defining laser characteristics. It needs to take as arguments

name, string Laser name

wavelength, float

energy, float Total energy of the laser pulse

profile, object

Same as parameters
